channel.title: Web Technique on Sampson's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Web Technique on Sampson's Personal Website

item.title: Build your own personal website starting with Hugo
item.description: Introduction of Hugo Unlike other frameworks like Jekyll and Hexo, which are developed for personal blog building, Hugo is a general-purpose website framework, also a static site generator. Hugo is developed by Go language and has a very fast responsive speed. I chose Hugo because it allows the author to post not only blogs but also some other things like docs, portfolios, etc. Hope you will enjoy Hugo just like me!
